questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In 10 years, i hope i will have a good job, that i like and where i'm feel good. I hope to get married, live in a beautiful house and maybe to be pregnant of my first child too.
I hope that all my family will be a live ever.
I don't want to loose my friends, so i hope, i would like very much that we will stay friend for every time.
